info.title: Library of Congress
info.description:
The Library of Congress service provides information about things you can find on the Library of Congress website, including:

items (books, archived websites, photos, and videos)
collections (thematic or otherwise grouped items that have been digitized)
images (thumbnails and higher resolution formats)

Library of Congress.description: The Library of Congress URL address.
Library of Congress.title: Library of Congress

get.description: Searches everything on the www.loc.gov website. Includes items in the collection, legislation, web pages, blog posts, and press releases.
Searches within a specific Library of Congress collection.
Searches the Library of Congress for items which have a specified original format.

library_of_congress_control_number.description: The Library of Congress control number.
library_of_congress_control_number.title: Library Of Congress Control Number

get.description: Retrieve a specific item from the Library of Congress.
